history.proof: intros a b. unfold SysPrf, equal, Plus. apply eqPlus. - apply eqSym. shelve. - apply eqSym. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall a b : Term, SysPrf PA (equal (Plus a b) (Plus b a))

Premises:
Plus = fun x y : Term => apply LNT Languages.Plus (Tcons LNT 1 x (Tcons LNT 0 y (Tnil LNT))) : Term -> Term -> Term
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNT : fol.System LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> Prop
equal = fol.equal LNT : fol.Term LNT -> fol.Term LNT -> fol.Formula LNT
PA = Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) PA6 : Ensemble Formula
pa6 : forall a b : Term, SysPrf PA (equal (Times a (Succ b)) (Plus (Times a b) a))
pa4 : forall a b : Term, SysPrf PA (equal (Plus a (Succ b)) (Succ (Plus a b)))
eqPlus : forall (T : System) (a b c d : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal c d) -> SysPrf T (equal (Plus a c) (Plus b d))
pa3 : forall a : Term, SysPrf PA (equal (Plus a Zero) a)
pa2 : forall a b : Term, SysPrf PA (impH (equal (Succ a) (Succ b)) (equal a b))
eqTrans : forall (T : System) (a b c : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal b c) -> SysPrf T (equal a c)
eqSym : forall (T : System) (a b : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal b a)
eqTimes : forall (T : System) (a b c d : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal c d) -> SysPrf T (equal (Times a c) (Times b d))
pa5 : forall a : Term, SysPrf PA (equal (Times a Zero) Zero)
eqSucc : forall (T : System) (a b : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal (Succ a) (Succ b))
pa1 : forall a : Term, SysPrf PA (notH (equal (Succ a) Zero))
ListExt.In_list_remove3 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a l -> a <> b -> In a (ListExt.list_remove A Aeq_dec b l)
ListExt.In_list_remove2 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a (ListExt.list_remove A Aeq_dec b l) -> a <> b
ListExt.In_list_remove1 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a (ListExt.list_remove A Aeq_dec b l) -> In a l
folLogic3.eqTrans : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b c : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L b c) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a c)
folLogic3.eqSym : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L b a)
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (fol.impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (fol.notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (fol.forallH L v a)) -> forall a : fol.Formula L, (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a
rebindForall : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), ~ In b (freeVarFormula L (fol.forallH L a f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.forallH L a f) (fol.forallH L b (substituteFormula L f a (fol.var L b))))
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
freeVarPlus : forall x y : Term, freeVarTerm LNT (Plus x y) = freeVarTerm LNT x ++ freeVarTerm LNT y
PA4 = forallH 1 (forallH 0 (equal (Plus (var 0) (Succ (var 1))) (Succ (Plus (var 0) (var 1))))) : fol.Formula LNT
eqRefl : forall (T : System) (a : Term), SysPrf T (equal a a)
paZeroOrSucc : forall t : Term, SysPrf PA (orH (equal t Zero) (existH (newVar (0 :: freeVarTerm LNT t)) (equal t (Succ (var (newVar (0 :: freeVarTerm LNT t)))))))
ListExt.no_dup : forall A : Set, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list A
PA3 = forallH 0 (equal (Plus (var 0) Zero) (var 0)) : fol.Formula LNT
ListExt.list_remove : forall A : Set, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> list A
LTFormula = existH 2 (equal (Plus (var 0) (Succ (var 2))) (var 1)) : fol.Formula LNT
PA6 = forallH 1 (forallH 0 (equal (Times (var 0) (Succ (var 1))) (Plus (Times (var 0) (var 1)) (var 0)))) : fol.Formula LNT
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (fol.impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (fol.notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (fol.forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
induct : forall (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf PA (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v f)
in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {~ In a l}
folLogic3.eqRefl : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a a)
PAdec : forall x : Formula, Ensembles.In Formula PA x \/ ~ Ensembles.In Formula PA x
substituteFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L n f) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (fol.forallH L n f)}
closedPA : forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v PA
LNT2LNT_term : forall t : Term, LNN2LNT_term (LNT2LNN_term t) = t
LNT2LNN_freeVarTerm : forall t : Term, freeVarTerm LNN (LNT2LNN_term t) = freeVarTerm LNT t
freeVarSucc : forall x : Term, freeVarTerm LNT (Succ x) = freeVarTerm LNT x
freeVarTimes : forall x y : Term, freeVarTerm LNT (Times x y) = freeVarTerm LNT x ++ freeVarTerm LNT y
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename

```coq
intros a b.
unfold SysPrf, equal, Plus.
apply eqPlus.
- apply eqSym. apply pa4.
- apply eqSym. apply pa4.
Qed.
```

original: intros a b. unfold SysPrf, equal, Plus. apply eqPlus. - apply eqSym. apply pa4. - apply eqSym. apply pa4.
